graph_title: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
indicator_name: Mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services)
target_name: By 2030, substantially reduce the number of deaths and illnesses from hazardous chemicals and air, water and soil pollution and contamination
goal_meta_link_text: United Nations Sustainable Development Goals Metadata (PDF 214 KB)
indicator_definition: The mortality rate attributed to unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe Water, Sanitation and Hygiene for All (WASH) services) as defined as the number of deaths from unsafe water, unsafe sanitation and lack of hygiene (exposure to unsafe WASH services) in a year, divided by the population, and multiplied by 1,000,000.
source_compilation_1: Committee on Statistics  of the Ministry of National Economy of the Republic of Kazakhstan
source_data_1: Information system "Registry office registry office" Local executive body, Information system "Attached population register" Ministry of Health of the Republic of Kazakhstan, Information system of Judicial bodies "Torelik" Supreme Court of the Republic of Kazakhstan
source_implementation_1: Ministry of Healthcare of the Republic of Kazakhstan
